# Void UI

> A light-first, composable React component library built on Base UI and Tailwind CSS v4.

Void UI is an experimental personal React component library that provides 40+ accessible, customizable components. It uses CSS custom properties for theming and integrates Phosphor Icons.

## Quick Start

```bash
pnpm add @radenadri/void-ui
```

### Setup

1. Import styles in your CSS:
```css
@import "tailwindcss";
@import "@radenadri/void-ui/styles.css";
@source "../node_modules/@radenadri/void-ui/dist";
```

2. Enable dark mode (optional):
```html
<html class="dark">
<!-- or -->
<html data-theme="dark">
```

3. Wrap app with ToastProvider (if using toasts):
```tsx
import { ToastProvider } from '@radenadri/void-ui'

function App() {
  return (
    <ToastProvider>
      {/* Your app */}
    </ToastProvider>
  )
}
```

## Design Tokens

Override CSS variables to customize theming:

```css
:root {
  /* Primary */
  --void-primary: #0891b2;
  --void-secondary: #e4e4e7;
  
  /* Status */
  --void-success: #059669;
  --void-warning: #d97706;
  --void-danger: #e11d48;
  --void-info: #0284c7;
  
  /* Surfaces (light theme default) */
  --void-bg: #fafafa;
  --void-surface: #ffffff;
  --void-bg-subtle: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.02);
  --void-bg-muted: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.04);
  
  /* Borders */
  --void-border: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.08);
  --void-border-hover: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.15);
  
  /* Text */
  --void-text: #09090b;
  --void-muted: #71717a;
  
  /* Shadows */
  --void-shadow-sm: 0 1px 2px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.05);
  --void-shadow-md: 0 4px 6px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.08);
  --void-shadow-lg: 0 10px 15px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
}

/* Dark mode */
[data-theme="dark"], .dark {
  --void-bg: #09090b;
  --void-surface: #18181b;
  --void-text: #fafafa;
  --void-muted: #a1a1aa;
  --void-border: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.08);
}
```

## Components

### Layout

#### Stack
Flexbox layout with spacing control.
```tsx
import { Stack } from '@radenadri/void-ui'

<Stack direction="row" spacing="md" align="center">
  <div>Item 1</div>
  <div>Item 2</div>
</Stack>
```
Props: `direction` ("row" | "column"), `spacing` ("xs" | "sm" | "md" | "lg" | "xl"), `align`, `justify`, `wrap`

#### Separator
Horizontal or vertical divider.
```tsx
import { Separator } from '@radenadri/void-ui'

<Separator orientation="horizontal" />
```

#### Divider
Visual divider with optional label.
```tsx
import { Divider } from '@radenadri/void-ui'

<Divider label="OR" />
```

### Forms

#### Button
Interactive button with variants and sizes.
```tsx
import { Button } from '@radenadri/void-ui'

<Button variant="primary" size="md">Click me</Button>
<Button variant="danger" size="sm"><Trash size={16} /> Delete</Button>
<Button size="icon"><Gear size={18} /></Button>
```
Props:
- `variant`: "primary" | "secondary" | "default" | "success" | "warning" | "danger" | "ghost" | "outline" | "outline-secondary" | "outline-danger"
- `size`: "xs" | "sm" | "md" | "lg" | "icon" | "icon-sm" | "icon-lg"
- `disabled`: boolean

#### Input
Text input field.
```tsx
import { Input } from '@radenadri/void-ui'

<Input placeholder="Enter text..." size="md" />
<Input type="email" disabled />
```
Props: `size` ("sm" | "md" | "lg"), `disabled`, standard input attributes

#### Textarea
Multi-line text input.
```tsx
import { Textarea } from '@radenadri/void-ui'

<Textarea placeholder="Enter description..." rows={4} />
```

#### Checkbox
Checkbox with optional group support.
```tsx
import { Checkbox } from '@radenadri/void-ui'

<Checkbox label="Accept terms" />
<Checkbox label="Subscribe" description="Get weekly updates" defaultChecked />
```
Props: `label`, `description`, `checked`, `defaultChecked`, `onCheckedChange`, `disabled`

#### Switch
Toggle switch with label.
```tsx
import { Switch } from '@radenadri/void-ui'

<Switch label="Dark mode" description="Enable dark theme" />
```
Props: `label`, `description`, `checked`, `defaultChecked`, `onCheckedChange`, `disabled`

#### Radio
Radio button group.
```tsx
import { Radio, RadioGroup, RadioItem } from '@radenadri/void-ui'

<RadioGroup defaultValue="option1">
  <RadioItem value="option1" label="Option 1" />
  <RadioItem value="option2" label="Option 2" />
</RadioGroup>
```

#### Select
Composable dropdown select.
```tsx
import { Select, SelectTrigger, SelectContent, SelectItem, SelectGroup, SelectGroupLabel, SelectSeparator } from '@radenadri/void-ui'

<Select defaultValue="apple">
  <SelectTrigger placeholder="Select fruit..." />
  <SelectContent>
    <SelectItem value="apple">Apple</SelectItem>
    <SelectItem value="banana">Banana</SelectItem>
  </SelectContent>
</Select>
```
Props (SelectContent): `side` ("top" | "bottom" | "left" | "right"), `align` ("start" | "center" | "end")

#### Slider
Range slider with value display.
```tsx
import { Slider } from '@radenadri/void-ui'

<Slider defaultValue={50} min={0} max={100} step={1} showValue />
```

#### Field
Form field wrapper with label, description, and error.
```tsx
import { FieldRoot, FieldLabel, FieldDescription, FieldError, Input } from '@radenadri/void-ui'

<FieldRoot>
  <FieldLabel>Email</FieldLabel>
  <FieldDescription>We'll never share your email.</FieldDescription>
  <Input type="email" />
  <FieldError>Invalid email address</FieldError>
</FieldRoot>
```

#### Fieldset
Group of related fields.
```tsx
import { Fieldset, FieldsetLegend } from '@radenadri/void-ui'

<Fieldset>
  <FieldsetLegend>Personal Information</FieldsetLegend>
  {/* Fields here */}
</Fieldset>
```

#### NumberField
Numeric input with increment/decrement.
```tsx
import { NumberField } from '@radenadri/void-ui'

<NumberField defaultValue={5} min={0} max={10} />
```

### Display

#### Alert
Contextual feedback messages.
```tsx
import { Alert, AlertTitle, AlertDescription } from '@radenadri/void-ui'

<Alert variant="success">
  <AlertTitle>Success!</AlertTitle>
  <AlertDescription>Your changes have been saved.</AlertDescription>
</Alert>
```
Props: `variant` ("default" | "success" | "warning" | "danger" | "info")

#### Avatar
User avatar with fallback.
```tsx
import { Avatar } from '@radenadri/void-ui'

<Avatar src="https://example.com/avatar.jpg" name="John Doe" size="md" />
<Avatar name="Jane Smith" /> {/* Shows initials "JS" */}
<Avatar fallback="?" />
```
Props: `src`, `name` (generates initials), `fallback`, `size` ("xs" | "sm" | "md" | "lg" | "xl")

#### Badge
Status indicators.
```tsx
import { Badge } from '@radenadri/void-ui'

<Badge variant="success">Active</Badge>
<Badge variant="warning" size="sm">Pending</Badge>
```
Props: `variant` ("default" | "primary" | "secondary" | "success" | "warning" | "danger"), `size` ("sm" | "md" | "lg")

#### Chip
Removable tag/chip.
```tsx
import { Chip } from '@radenadri/void-ui'

<Chip onRemove={() => console.log('removed')}>React</Chip>
```

#### Card
Content container.
```tsx
import { Card, CardHeader, CardTitle, CardDescription, CardBody, CardFooter, Button } from '@radenadri/void-ui'

<Card>
  <CardHeader>
    <CardTitle>Card Title</CardTitle>
    <CardDescription>Card description</CardDescription>
  </CardHeader>
  <CardBody>
    <p>Card content here</p>
  </CardBody>
  <CardFooter>
    <Button>Action</Button>
  </CardFooter>
</Card>
```

#### Spinner
Loading indicator.
```tsx
import { Spinner } from '@radenadri/void-ui'

<Spinner size="md" />
```
Props: `size` ("sm" | "md" | "lg")

#### Progress
Progress bar.
```tsx
import { Progress } from '@radenadri/void-ui'

<Progress value={75} max={100} variant="primary" />
```
Props: `value`, `max`, `variant` ("primary" | "success" | "warning" | "danger")

#### Table
Data table components.
```tsx
import { TableContainer, Table, TableHeader, TableBody, TableRow, TableHead, TableCell } from '@radenadri/void-ui'

<TableContainer>
  <Table>
    <TableHeader>
      <TableRow>
        <TableHead>Name</TableHead>
        <TableHead>Email</TableHead>
      </TableRow>
    </TableHeader>
    <TableBody>
      <TableRow>
        <TableCell>John</TableCell>
        <TableCell>john@example.com</TableCell>
      </TableRow>
    </TableBody>
  </Table>
</TableContainer>
```

#### Text
Typography component.
```tsx
import { Text } from '@radenadri/void-ui'

<Text variant="muted" size="sm">Secondary text</Text>
```
Props: `variant` ("default" | "muted"), `size` ("xs" | "sm" | "md" | "lg" | "xl")

#### Heading
Semantic headings.
```tsx
import { Heading } from '@radenadri/void-ui'

<Heading as="h1" size="3xl">Page Title</Heading>
<Heading as="h2" size="xl">Section Title</Heading>
```
Props: `as` ("h1" | "h2" | "h3" | "h4" | "h5" | "h6"), `size` ("xs" | "sm" | "md" | "lg" | "xl" | "2xl" | "3xl" | "4xl")

#### Kbd
Keyboard shortcut display.
```tsx
import { Kbd } from '@radenadri/void-ui'

<Kbd>⌘</Kbd> + <Kbd>K</Kbd>
```

#### IconBox
Icon container with background.
```tsx
import { IconBox, Bell } from '@radenadri/void-ui'

<IconBox variant="primary" size="md">
  <Bell size={20} />
</IconBox>
```

### Navigation

#### Tabs
Tab panels.
```tsx
import { Tabs, TabsList, TabsTrigger, TabsContent } from '@radenadri/void-ui'

<Tabs defaultValue="tab1">
  <TabsList>
    <TabsTrigger value="tab1">Tab 1</TabsTrigger>
    <TabsTrigger value="tab2">Tab 2</TabsTrigger>
  </TabsList>
  <TabsContent value="tab1">Content 1</TabsContent>
  <TabsContent value="tab2">Content 2</TabsContent>
</Tabs>
```

#### Accordion
Collapsible sections.
```tsx
import { Accordion, AccordionItem, AccordionTrigger, AccordionContent } from '@radenadri/void-ui'

<Accordion>
  <AccordionItem value="item-1">
    <AccordionTrigger>Section 1</AccordionTrigger>
    <AccordionContent>Content for section 1</AccordionContent>
  </AccordionItem>
</Accordion>
```
Props (Accordion): `defaultValue`, `value`, `onValueChange`

#### Pagination
Page navigation.
```tsx
import { Pagination } from '@radenadri/void-ui'

<Pagination currentPage={1} totalPages={10} onPageChange={(page) => console.log(page)} />
```

#### Menu
Dropdown menu.
```tsx
import { Menu, MenuTrigger, MenuContent, MenuItem, MenuSeparator, MenuGroup, MenuGroupLabel, Button } from '@radenadri/void-ui'

<Menu>
  <MenuTrigger>
    <Button>Options</Button>
  </MenuTrigger>
  <MenuContent>
    <MenuItem shortcut="⌘N">New File</MenuItem>
    <MenuItem shortcut="⌘O">Open</MenuItem>
    <MenuSeparator />
    <MenuItem className="text-(--void-danger)">Delete</MenuItem>
  </MenuContent>
</Menu>
```
Props (MenuItem): `shortcut`, `disabled`, `onClick`

#### Dropdown
Enhanced dropdown with checkbox items.
```tsx
import { Dropdown, DropdownTrigger, DropdownContent, DropdownCheckboxItem, Button } from '@radenadri/void-ui'

<Dropdown>
  <DropdownTrigger>
    <Button>Filter</Button>
  </DropdownTrigger>
  <DropdownContent>
    <DropdownCheckboxItem checked>Option 1</DropdownCheckboxItem>
    <DropdownCheckboxItem>Option 2</DropdownCheckboxItem>
  </DropdownContent>
</Dropdown>
```

### Overlay

#### Dialog
Modal dialog.
```tsx
import { Dialog, DialogTrigger, DialogContent, DialogHeader, DialogTitle, DialogDescription, DialogFooter, DialogClose, Button } from '@radenadri/void-ui'

<Dialog>
  <DialogTrigger>
    <Button>Open Dialog</Button>
  </DialogTrigger>
  <DialogContent>
    <DialogHeader>
      <DialogTitle>Dialog Title</DialogTitle>
      <DialogDescription>Dialog description here.</DialogDescription>
    </DialogHeader>
    <DialogFooter>
      <DialogClose>
        <Button variant="ghost">Cancel</Button>
      </DialogClose>
      <Button>Confirm</Button>
    </DialogFooter>
  </DialogContent>
</Dialog>
```
Props (DialogContent): `showClose` (boolean, default true)

#### AlertDialog
Confirmation dialog.
```tsx
import { AlertDialog, AlertDialogTrigger, AlertDialogContent, AlertDialogHeader, AlertDialogTitle, AlertDialogDescription, AlertDialogFooter, AlertDialogCancel, AlertDialogAction, Button } from '@radenadri/void-ui'

<AlertDialog>
  <AlertDialogTrigger>
    <Button variant="danger">Delete</Button>
  </AlertDialogTrigger>
  <AlertDialogContent>
    <AlertDialogHeader>
      <AlertDialogTitle>Are you sure?</AlertDialogTitle>
      <AlertDialogDescription>This action cannot be undone.</AlertDialogDescription>
    </AlertDialogHeader>
    <AlertDialogFooter>
      <AlertDialogCancel>Cancel</AlertDialogCancel>
      <AlertDialogAction>Delete</AlertDialogAction>
    </AlertDialogFooter>
  </AlertDialogContent>
</AlertDialog>
```

#### Popover
Floating content panel.
```tsx
import { Popover, PopoverTrigger, PopoverContent, PopoverTitle, PopoverDescription, PopoverClose, Button } from '@radenadri/void-ui'

<Popover>
  <PopoverTrigger>
    <Button>Open Popover</Button>
  </PopoverTrigger>
  <PopoverContent className="w-72">
    <PopoverClose />
    <PopoverTitle>Popover Title</PopoverTitle>
    <PopoverDescription>Popover content here.</PopoverDescription>
  </PopoverContent>
</Popover>
```
Props (PopoverContent): `side` ("top" | "bottom" | "left" | "right"), `align` ("start" | "center" | "end"), `showArrow`

#### Tooltip
Hover hints.
```tsx
import { TooltipProvider, Tooltip, TooltipTrigger, TooltipContent, Button } from '@radenadri/void-ui'

<TooltipProvider>
  <Tooltip>
    <TooltipTrigger>
      <Button size="icon"><Gear size={18} /></Button>
    </TooltipTrigger>
    <TooltipContent side="top">Settings</TooltipContent>
  </Tooltip>
</TooltipProvider>
```
Props (TooltipProvider): `delayDuration`
Props (TooltipContent): `side` ("top" | "bottom" | "left" | "right")

#### Toast
Notifications.
```tsx
import { ToastProvider, toastManager, useToastManager, Button } from '@radenadri/void-ui'

// Wrap app with ToastProvider
<ToastProvider position="bottom-right">
  <App />
</ToastProvider>

// Use global toastManager (anywhere)
toastManager.add({
  title: 'Success',
  description: 'Your changes have been saved.',
  type: 'success', // 'success' | 'error' | 'warning' | 'info'
})

// Or use hook inside components
function MyComponent() {
  const toast = useToastManager()
  
  return (
    <Button onClick={() => toast.add({ title: 'Hello!' })}>
      Show Toast
    </Button>
  )
}
```
Props (ToastProvider): `position` ("top-left" | "top-center" | "top-right" | "bottom-left" | "bottom-center" | "bottom-right")
Toast options: `title`, `description`, `type`, `duration`

#### Collapsible
Expandable panel.
```tsx
import { Collapsible, CollapsibleTrigger, CollapsibleContent, Button } from '@radenadri/void-ui'

<Collapsible>
  <CollapsibleTrigger>
    <Button variant="ghost">Toggle</Button>
  </CollapsibleTrigger>
  <CollapsibleContent>
    Hidden content here
  </CollapsibleContent>
</Collapsible>
```

## Icons

Void UI re-exports Phosphor Icons:

```tsx
import { Bell, Gear, User, Trash, Plus, Check, X, CaretDown, ArrowRight } from '@radenadri/void-ui'

<Bell size={20} weight="duotone" />
```

Common icons: `Bell`, `Gear`, `User`, `Trash`, `Plus`, `Check`, `X`, `CaretDown`, `CaretUp`, `ArrowRight`, `ArrowLeft`, `MagnifyingGlass`, `Eye`, `EyeSlash`, `Copy`, `Download`, `Upload`, `Info`, `Warning`, `CheckCircle`, `XCircle`

## Utilities

### cn()
Merge Tailwind classes with clsx and tailwind-merge:
```tsx
import { cn } from '@radenadri/void-ui'

<div className={cn('base-class', isActive && 'active-class', className)} />
```

## Customization

### Override CSS Variables
```css
:root {
  --void-primary: #8b5cf6; /* Purple instead of cyan */
}

[data-theme="light"] {
  --void-bg: #ffffff;
  --void-surface: #f4f4f5;
  --void-text: #18181b;
}
```

### Component-Level Customization
All components accept `className` prop:
```tsx
<Button className="bg-purple-500 hover:bg-purple-600">Custom</Button>
<Card className="border-2 border-dashed">Custom Card</Card>
```

## Requirements

- React 18+
- Tailwind CSS 4+

## License

MIT
